cloudConfig.title: DataStax Astra DB Configuration
cloudConfig.description: Configuration for connecting to DataStax Astra DB in the cloud.

connectTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds for establishing new connections to Cassandra.

requestTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds for individual Cassandra requests.

token.description: The Astra DB application token used for authentication.

secureConnectBundle.description: File path to the Secure Connect Bundle (.zip) used for a secure connection to DataStax Astra DB.

username.title: Username
username.description: Username to connect to Cassandra. This user should have privileges to read all the metadata in Cassandra.

hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: Host and port of the Cassandra service when using the `cassandra` connection scheme. Only host when using the `cassandra+srv` scheme.

databaseName.title: Database Name
databaseName.description: Optional name to give to the database in OpenMetadata. If left blank, we will use default as the database name.
